title: Impact of the Learning Styles Myth on Education and Alternative Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and foundational understanding of diverse learning methodologies
context.additional_context: Reflecting the characteristics of science-gifted students considering professional careers (medical/legal/technical), enabling collaboration and research activities via smartphone-centric approaches in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can critically assess the scientific basis of learning style theories and explain their limitations.
Learners can design and implement project-based science lessons that integrate diverse teaching methodologies.
Learners can propose practical educational strategies considering student motivation and learning effectiveness.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
